body:
- [x] Resolves issue #1287 and #1204.
- [x] Code is [rebased][sync] on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.

This is the corresponding changes in project.json for the new MMI nuget package.
@vors can you please take a look?
title: Update project.json files to keep sync with the new MMI nuget package
